ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:0.2_0: The monks’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:0.5_0: 24. The training rule on rainy-season robes
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:1.2_0: he allowed the rainy-season robe for the monks.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:1.3_0: Knowing that this was the case, the monks from the group of six
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:1.4_0: went looking for cloth for their rainy-season robes early.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:1.5_0: And after sewing them early, they wore them.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:1.6_0: Then, because their rainy-season robes were worn, they bathed naked in the rain.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:1.7_0: The monks of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:1.8_0: “How can the monks from the group of six wear their rainy-season robes early, sew them early, and then wear them, and then, because they’re worn, bathe naked in the rain?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:1.9_0: After criticizing those monks in many ways, they told the Buddha ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:1.10_0: “Is it true, monks, that you did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:1.11_0: after wearing the sarong like this,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:1.12_0: Then, because their rainy-season robes were worn, they bathed naked in the rain.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:1.15_0: “... Foolish men, how can you go looking for cloth for your rainy-season robes early, sew them early, and then wear them, and then, because your rainy-season robes are worn, bathe naked in the rain?
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:1.16_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:1.17_0: the Buddha said, “And so, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:1.18.1_0: ‘When there is a month left of the hot season, a monk may go looking for cloth for his rainy-season robe.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:1.18.1_1: after sewing it during the last half-month of the hot season, he may wear it.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:1.19_0: If he goes looking for cloth for his rainy-season robe when there is more than a month left of the hot season, or if he sews it and then wears it when there is more than a half-month left, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.1_0: When there is a month left of the hot season, a monk may go looking for cloth for his rainy-season robe:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.2_0: after approaching those people who previously, too, have given cloth for the rainy-season robes, he should say, “It’s time for the rainy-season robe,” “It’s the occasion for the rainy-season robe,” “Other people, too, are giving cloth for the rainy-season robe.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.3_0: He should not say, “Give me cloth for the rainy-season robe,” “Bring me cloth for the rainy-season robe,” “Swap me cloth for the rainy-season robe,” “Buy me cloth for the rainy-season robe.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.4_0: When there is a half-month left, he may sew it and then wear it:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.5_0: after sewing it during the last half-month of the hot season, he may wear it.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.6_0: When there is more than a month left of the hot season:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.7_0: if he goes looking for cloth for the rainy-season robe when there is more than a month left of the hot season, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.8_0: When there is more than a half-month left:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.9_0: if he wears it after sewing it when there is more than a half-month left of the hot season, it becomes subject to relinquishment.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.10_0: It should be relinquished to a sangha, a group, or an individual.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.11_0: “And, monks, it should be relinquished like this. ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.13_0: ‘Venerables, this cloth for the rainy-season robe which I went looking for when there was more than a month left of the hot season or which I wore after sewing it when there was more than a half-month left of the hot season is to be relinquished.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.14_0: I relinquish them to the Sangha.’ ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.17_0: ‘I give these tonics back to you.’”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.18.1_0: If there is more than a month left of the hot season, and he perceives it as more, and he goes looking for cloth for a rainy-season robe, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.19_0: If there is more than a month left of the hot season, but he is unsure of it, and he goes looking for cloth for a rainy-season robe, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.20_0: If there is more than a month left of the hot season, but he perceives it as less, and he goes looking for cloth for a rainy-season robe, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.21_0: If there is more than a half-month left of the hot season, and he perceives it as more, and he wears the rainy-season robe after sewing it, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.22_0: If there is more than a half-month left of the hot season, but he is unsure of it, and he wears the rainy-season robe after sewing it, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.23_0: If there is more than a half-month left of the hot season, but he perceives it as less, and he wears the rainy-season robe after sewing it, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.24_0: If he has a rainy-season robe, but he bathes naked in the rain, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.25_0: If there is less than a month left of the hot season, but he perceives it as more, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.26_0: If there is less than a month left of the hot season, but he is unsure of it, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.27_0: If there is less than a month left of the hot season, and he perceives it as less, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.28_0: If there is less than a half-month left of the hot season, but he perceives it as more, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.29_0: If there is less than a half-month left of the hot season, but he is unsure of it, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.30_0: If there is less than a half-month left of the hot season, and he perceives it as less, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.32_0: When there is a month left of the hot season, applies cloth for the rainy-season robe:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.33_0: if he wears the rainy-season robe after sewing it when there is a half-month left of the hot season;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.34_0: if he goes looking for cloth for his rainy-season robe when there is a month left of the hot season;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.35_0: if he wears the rainy-season robe after sewing it when there is a half-month left of the hot season;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.36_0: if, after looking for a rainy-season robe, he postpones the rainy-season residence;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.37_0: if, after wearing a rainy-season robe, he postpones the rainy-season residence (in which case he should wash it and store it and then use it at the right time);
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.38_0: if his robe has been stolen;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.39_0: if his robe has been lost;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.40_0: They burn in times of trouble,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.43_0: The fourth rule, the training rule on rainy-season robes, is finished.
